title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 366-2.6 - Implementation plan and schedule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 366-2.6 - Implementation plan and schedule

State Regulations
A LSWMP must include an implementation schedule, with
appropriate detail, that outlines the dates of all major milestones and events
over the LSWMP planning period that will occur to implement the selected
alternatives outlined in subdivision
366-2.5
(c) of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
366-2.6

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
